articles.description: Indian wicketkeeper-batter and Delhi Capitals (DC) skipper Rishabh Pant has shared an emotional letter for his late father on Instagram. Rishabh’s father, Rajendra Pant, passed away due to a cardiac arrest in 2017. Two days after his father's demise, Pant had…

articles.title: Sreeshankar vs Aldrin: A battle for the ages, a national record that only won a silver - ESPN India
articles.description: Sreeshankar had set a new national record in long jump at the Federation Cup but it was Aldrin who won the gold medal.
articles.content:
High drama at the Federation Cup event in Kozhikode today saw a new national record in the long jump - but that wasn't good enough to win gold. And the winning jump wasn't deemed a national record.
